description.en:
REDC is a ZRC-2 governance token of RedChillies Labs which is utilized across its decentralized platforms. Currently, REDC token is used in zilchill.com for hosting games.

With max supply of 2 millions REDC tokens, it primarily acts as a gas fee to host (create) any games. Every hosted game normally costs 1 to 10 REDC tokens and every game-result rewards max 2 REDC tokens. REDC are distributed from Leaderboard loyalty points to max 4 parties (Game Developer, Game Host, Game Player and Game Governor).
